title.native: 探偵はもう、死んでいる。

description:
Thwarting a hijacking with the beautiful, silver-haired detective, Siesta, transforms Kimihiko’s young life. Their success kicks off years of crime-solving and confronting syndicates around the world—until Siesta dies. Left with questions, Kimihiko moves on. But now, a new case may open healed wounds as it connects to an assassin, a world conspiracy, and his dead partner!

(Source: Funimation)

Note: The first episode aired with a runtime of ~46 minutes as opposed to the standard 24 minute long episode.
synonyms: นักสืบตายแล้ว

tags.name: Detective
tags.description: Features a character who investigates and solves crimes.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Achronological Order
tags.description: Chapters or episodes do not occur in chronological order.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Body Swapping
tags.description: Centers around individuals swapping bodies with one another.

tags.name: Terrorism
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a terrorist or terrorist organization.

tags.name: Crime
tags.description: Centers around unlawful activities punishable by the state or other authority.

tags.name: Dissociative Identities
tags.description: A case where one or more people share the same body.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Artificial Intelligence
tags.description: Intelligent non-organic machines that work and react similarly to humans.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Aliens
tags.description: Prominently features extraterrestrial lifeforms.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Prison
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a prison.

tags.name: Police
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of law enforcement officers.

tags.name: VTuber
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is either an actual or fictive VTuber.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Super Robot
tags.description: Prominently features large robots often piloted by hot-blooded protagonists.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Robots
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid machines.

name.native: シャーロット・有坂・アンダーソン

node.description:
[Website](http://hitodama.info/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/hitodama1103/)

A Japanese singer, songwriter, radio personality and scriptwriter.

She has released 17 singles and 11 albums since her debut as a 13-year-old in 1994. Several of her songs have been used as anime theme songs. She is often mistaken for a voice actress because she is in the same field of activity as idol-esque voice actresses. When she is working as a screenwriter, she goes by the name Deko Akao, an alias made up from her senior [Satoru Akahori](https://anilist.co/staff/97460/)'s name.

Mother of a son and twin daughters.

__[Website](https://www.inametoru.com/) | [Blog (JP)](http://40meter.blog125.fc2.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/40mP) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/40meterP)__

__40meterP__, better known as 40mP, or alternatively known by alias Iname Tooru, is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, arranger, composer, producer and illustrator. He uses the name 40mP when doing VOCALOID music composition, production and illustration, while as a singer-songwriter he uses the name Iname Tooru. 

His works usually exceed 100,000 views in average. His most popular songs are "Karakuri Pierrot" and "Ren'ai Saiban", both achieving over 10M views. He has produced the most #1 songs on the Weekly VOCALOID Ranking, with 27 songs. He also holds the record for the most songs to enter the Hall of Fame, with a total of 76 works. This producer has released work in the VOCALOID-P data series.

__[Website](https://www.inametoru.com/) | [Blog (JP)](http://40meter.blog125.fc2.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/40mP) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/40meterP)__

His works usually exceed 100,000 views in average. His most popular songs are "Karakuri Pierrot" and "Ren'ai Saiban", both achieving over 10M views. He has produced the most #1 songs on the Weekly VOCALOID Ranking, with 27 songs. He also holds the record for the most songs to enter the Hall of Fame, with a total of 76 works. Birthplace: Wangen im Allgäu, Germany

[Official Website](http://studio-dreizehn.com/) | [Synchronkartei](https://www.synchronkartei.de/sprecher/11724/2) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yannick_mg/)

Birthplace: Wangen im Allgäu, Germany

[Official Website](http://studio-dreizehn.com/) | [Synchronkartei](https://www.synchronkartei.de/sprecher/11724/2) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yannick_mg/)

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/rodrigoomartim/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/rodrigo_martim)

Rodrigo Martim is a Brazilian actor, voice actor and dubbing director. He currently directs at the DuBrasil studio.

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/andrerinaldidub/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/andrerinaldidub) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/andrerinaldidub) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@andrerinaldidub) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJB9-DmISWwZaBMmDqK7i2A) | [Site Web](https://www.andrerinaldi.com)

André Augusto Rinaldi is a Brazilian actor, voice actor and dubbing director. He currently directs at Grupo Macias and at DuBrasil. He is the cousin of the voice actor [Fabricio Rinaldi](https://anilist.co/staff/209058/).
Junichirou Suzuki is a music selector.
